title: no clear instructions to set up or use
text: no clear instructions on how to set up or use this wifi plug. Only works half the time and only when on the same network. although once it did work while away. only good if you can find info on how to set up or use. it took me 1 year of searching just to find this app for my ipod

title: Needs LOTS of improvement
text: Wanted these to work at a remote location-pretty much a joke. Had trouble with set up, once that was worked out with much anguish, and i thought it worked, i left and it would not turn anything on or off and there was no way to correct problems remotely. You must be on same network to do anything. Switched them out for Ediplugs. Still trying to utilize these (4) plugs for more than paperweights at my local location and the still wont connect to my network. Look for another product, i wasted my money on these 'dumb plugs'

title: Works fine now.
text:
The adaptation of the WIWO design really changed this app for the best. The remote on and off functions now work consistently good lately, no failure like before. 
I need to order more, but they always sell out fast.

text: Half the time when this app tells me that my switch is turned on, it is in fact turned off.

title: Poor mans nest
text: Great product. I connected my window AC unit to it now it's like I have a nest but I didn't need to pay $250 or install anything now my home is always cool when I get home without running up my bill!

title: Great app!
text: Wow this app is so easy to use and really useful. Love how you can control the air condition and lamp with your phone. Quick and easy setup, instructions are really clear and simple. This app is awesome !!

title: Lazy & loving it!
text: This was sooo easy to install my husband thinks hes a superhero! I can control the Air conditioning without having to leave my bed ever! Between bayit switch and bayit light, I am like an actual queen!
